misalignments.reasoning: API endpoint POST /api/auth/register is completely missing. The codebase has /api/auth/signup instead, which is a different route path than specified
Task list items specified to use checkbox (left) for toggling completion, but implementation uses a button with text symbols (✓/○) instead of actual checkbox input element
TaskInput component button text specified as 'Add Task' but implementation shows 'Create' instead
Login page specified to have client-side validation for email format, but no email format validation logic exists in the login page component before submission
